name: Garbage Insanity
uniques: Unit will heal every turn, even if it performs an action

civilopediaText.text: 'A wise man, recognizing that the world is but an illusion, does not act as if it is real, so he escapes the suffering.'

'True happiness cannot possibly exist... for the foolish person it is convenient to live, but to the wise person it is a matter of apathy; and that the wise person will do everything for his own sake; for that he will not consider any one else of equal importance with himself...'

What we've got here... this is good garbage. It doesn't get any better than this, you should know that more than anyone. If you can't see the good in this place, you're not gonna be satisfied anywhere.

civilopediaText.text:
'In the desert
I saw a creature, naked, bestial,
Who, squatting upon the ground,
Held his heart in his hands,
And ate of it.
I said, 'Is it good, friend?'
'It is bitterâ€”bitter,' he answered;
'But I like it
Because it is bitter,
And because it is my heart.''
